phase_rules.notes: Focus on movement quality over load. Build habits first.

weekly_targets.notes: No HIIT in Phase 1. KB swings provide some vigorous HR work within strength sessions.

weeks_1_4.name: Foundation
weeks_1_4.progression: Add 1-2 reps per week if form is solid

weeks_5_8.name: Building
weeks_5_8.progression: Add 2.5-5kg when hitting top of rep range

deload_protocol.structure: Same exercises, fewer sets (2 instead of 3-4), lighter weight

monday.name: Lower Body + Posterior Chain
monday.focus: Hip hinge, squat pattern, ankle stability

exercises.name: Single Leg Balance (pillow)
exercises.notes: Eyes open week 1-4, progress to eyes closed
exercises.progression: Add unstable surface or eyes closed

exercises.name: Goblet Squat
exercises.notes: Heels elevated if ankle mobility limited
exercises.progression: Week 1-4: 8-12 reps, Week 5-8: 8-10 reps heavier, Week 9-12: 6-8 reps

exercises.name: Romanian Deadlift (DB)
exercises.notes: Feel hamstrings stretch, slight knee bend only
exercises.progression: Increase weight when 12 reps is easy

exercises.name: KB Swings
exercises.notes: Hip snap, not squat. Provides some Zone 4 HR work.

exercises.name: Split Squat (Bodyweight/Light DB)
exercises.notes: Focus on balance and hip flexor stretch
exercises.progression: Add dumbbells, then elevate rear foot

exercises.name: Bird-Dog
exercises.notes: Core braced, no back arch. McGill Big 3 component.

exercises.name: McGill Curl-Up
exercises.notes: Hands under lower back. Brace. Lift head/shoulders only. 8-10s holds. McGill Big 3 component.

exercises.name: Banded Ankle Dorsiflexion Mobilization
exercises.notes: RIGHT ANKLE ONLY. Band above ankle, drive knee forward over toes. 3s hold at end range. Priority exercise for 4cm deficit.

exercises.name: Single-Leg RDL (Right Side Priority)
exercises.notes: RIGHT leg standing first. Light weight. Focus on hip hinge + ankle stability. Keep standing knee slightly pushed out. Addresses compensation patterns.

tuesday.name: Zone 2 Aerobic Base
tuesday.notes: Watch documentary or audiobook. Make it enjoyable. HR should stay conversational.
tuesday.ice_bath: YES - optimal day, 4+ hours from yesterday's strength

wednesday.name: Upper Body + Core (Shoulder Rehab Focus)
wednesday.focus: Push/pull balance, shoulder repair, core stability
shoulder_restrictions: Stop if sharp pain in Zone B (deltoid insertion)

exercises: Shoulder painkiller isometrics (doorframe ER 60s x3 at 40-70% MVC - Rio protocol)

exercises.name: Floor Press (DB)
exercises.notes: Floor stops elbows going too deep - protects shoulder capsule

exercises.name: Chest-Supported Row (Incline Bench)
exercises.notes: Squeeze shoulder blades DOWN and back. Protects lower back.

exercises.name: Face Pulls (Band or Cable)
exercises.notes: External rotation at top. Critical for shoulder health.

exercises.name: Landmine Press (or Kneeling Single-Arm DB Press)
exercises.notes: Angled pressing is safer for impingement

exercises.name: Side-Lying External Rotation (Eccentric)
exercises.notes: THE HEALER. 1-2kg max. Lift with help, lower SLOWLY (4s)

exercises.name: McGill Big 3 Circuit
exercises.reps: Curl-up x10, Side plank 30s each, Bird-dog x10 each
exercises.notes: Essential for back pain prevention

exercises.name: Pallof Press
exercises.notes: Anti-rotation core. Keep hips square.

thursday.name: Mobility + Light Zone 2
thursday.modality: Mobility flow + Easy cycling or walking

exercises: World's Greatest Stretch x10 each side

part_b_easy_cardio.description: Easy cycling OR walking with dog/baby
part_b_easy_cardio.notes: TRUE recovery. If fatigued, do NSDR instead.

thursday.red_day_override: If RED status, do 20 min NSDR instead of cardio portion

friday.name: Full Body + Power Elements
friday.focus: Compound movements, carrying capacity, functional strength
friday.notes: Peak power day - ensure good sleep night before

exercises.name: Deadlift (Trap Bar or DB)
exercises.notes: Hip hinge, not squat. Brace core.
exercises.progression: Work toward heavier loads with good form

exercises.name: Goblet Squat (Heavy)
exercises.notes: Heavier than Monday, lower reps

exercises.name: KB Clean & Press
exercises.notes: Power from hips, press from shoulder
exercises.week_1_4_modification: Substitute Landmine Press if shoulder not ready

exercises.name: Farmers Walk / Suitcase Carry
exercises.notes: Suitcase = one hand only, anti-lateral flexion

exercises.name: Turkish Get-Up
exercises.notes: Start light, focus on each position

exercises.name: Neck Harness or Manual Resistance
exercises.notes: Start VERY light. Blueprint standard.

exercises.name: Side Plank
exercises.notes: McGill Big 3 component. Elbow under shoulder. Straight line from head to feet.

exercises.name: Inverted Rows (TRX/Bar)
exercises.notes: Horizontal pulling. Feet on floor, body at angle. Squeeze shoulder blades. Addresses back pulling volume gap.
exercises.progression: Lower body angle to increase difficulty

exercises.name: Lateral Band Walks
exercises.notes: Band above knees. Stay low in quarter squat. Burn in glute med = good. Fixes knee valgus pattern.

saturday.name: Extended Zone 2 (No HIIT in Phase 1)
saturday.modality: Ruck walk, Cycling, OR Outdoor activity with family

option_a_ruck_walk.description: 50 min Zone 2 ruck walk (PREFERRED for ankle rehab)
option_a_ruck_walk.notes: Great for core/posture. Zero impact. HR 109-127 bpm.

option_b_brisk_walk.notes: Zero ankle impact. May need incline to reach Zone 2 HR.

option_c_bike.description: 60 min Zone 2 steady state on bike

option_d_family_activity.description: Hike or beach walk with family
option_d_family_activity.notes: Wear Garmin, track HR to ensure Zone 2

hiit_clearance_requirements: Pain ≤2/10 for 2+ weeks on shoulder AND ankle
saturday.phase_1_note: NO HIIT/Intervals in Phase 1. Saturday becomes extended Zone 2, not vigorous day. Jogging NOT recommended until walk test passed.

progression.weeks_9_12: 60 min Zone 2, add 4x30s 'strides' in final 2 weeks to prep for Phase 2

saturday.ice_bath: YES - good day for cold exposure

sunday.name: Active Recovery + Family Time
sunday.notes: True rest day. System reset before Monday strength.

gate_1_requirements.name: Ready to Start Running
gate_1_requirements.fail_action: Continue Phase 1, address deficits, retest in 1-2 weeks
